settings.calendar_title: Jackery Day 2022 - New Product Launch Event

settings.answer_button: The survey is no longer available.
settings.question_policy: I have read and agreed to the TermsandPrivacy Policy.
settings.question_policy_1: Answer all survey questions and provide an email to participate. One email can be used once only.
settings.question_policy_3: The competition time is held from May 4 - 12 and will announce winners on May 16 on the official website with an email sent to the winners, via hello@jackery.com.
settings.question_policy_4: The competition on this page is open to U.S. residents only. However you can enter the same competition through Jackery Canada, Germany, U.K. and Japan if you are residents from these countries.
settings.question_policy_5: All final decisions lie solely with Jackery.
settings.q1_tips: Jackery was founded in 2012 by a group of adventurous engineers, who believe in making electricity portable, clean, outdoors-oriented, and truly accessible.
settings.q2_title: What is Jackery's bundle containing a power station and solar panels called?
settings.q2_tips: To further our goal of making electricity greener and more efficient, in 2020 Jackery expanded its product line fully integrating portability with solar power - the Solar Generator series, combines power stations with solar panels.
settings.q3_title: In what scenarios can solar generators be used?
settings.q3_tips: A solar generator is a reliable and clean power source for campers, RVs, or as an emergency backup source when your power goes out.
settings.q4_title: What is the material of Jackery's battery made from?
settings.q4_tips: The Jackery power station is equipped with a lithium-ion battery pack. No fuel or gasoline is required - with no dangerous fumes produced, additionally resulting in minimum noise.
settings.q5_title: What is the name of the Jackery Power Station with the largest capacity?
settings.q5_tips: The Explorer 2000 features 2060 Wh capacity and 2200W AC inverter - designed to meet 90% of power requirements when running the majority of appliances. These include hair dryers, microwave ovens, refrigerators, coffee makers, air conditioners and more.
settings.q6_title: Where would you most like to see improvements made to for Jackery's solar generators?
settings.q6_tips: Please select one - all customer feedback is valuable.
settings.q7_title: How much coal is used to generate one kilowatt-hour of electricity?
settings.q7_tips: The average amount of coal used to generate just a single kilowatt-hour (kWh) of electricity by the U.S. electric power sector in 2020 was 1 pound. So for every single kilowatt-hour (kWh) of electricity used, 1 pound of coal was used.
settings.q8_title: Assuming the SG1500 is used 4 times per month for 3 charging cycles (Note: one cycle = one charge and one discharge), in terms of equivalent carbon emissions how many trees will be saved in a year?
settings.q8_survey: The Solar Generator collects solar energy, and converts energy into direct current electricity. The SG1500 reduces CO2 emissions by 250 pounds – an equivalent of planting approximately four trees per year.
settings.q8_tips: Calculation: According to U.S. Energy Information Administration, one KWh of electricity emits 0.85 pounds of CO2. According to the Arbor Day Foundation, in one year a mature tree absorbs more than 48 pounds of carbon dioxide from the atmosphere.
settings.Completing_title: Thank You For Completing the Jackery Day Survey!
settings.Completing_tips: What's next? Visit Jackery's Official Website for Jackery Day Live on May 12 and our magnificent new product launch. We'll then announce the competition survey winners on May 16.
settings.features_sub_title:
Before the launch date, we'll have a teaser to reveal two special features - with the latest state-of-the-art Solar Technology and more.
Stay put, and get ready for the incredible to happen.
settings.selling_1_content: Housing one of the most efficient solar technologies worldwide, delivering outstanding transmittance. Providing you with an efficient and powerful solar charging experience.
settings.selling_2_content: The all new technology will allow charging to become even safer and more secure - taking safe charging to the very next level. 2 chips and 4 temperature core detectors guarantee safe charging for all.
